nodes.text: The Ikadrian flitter-whipit was a creature known for its short attention span. According to the RA-7 protocol droid DK-RA-43 in the book the Galactic Explorer's Guide, his master, Hondo Ohnaka, had an attention span shorter than some Ikadrian flitter-whipits.
Ikadrian flitter-whipits were first mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Galactic Explorer's Guide, written by Jason Fry.
